firstProject.title: Academic Connection
firstProject.description: Academic Connection is a web application designed to connect students and parents with secondary schools

secondProject.title: TaskFlow
secondProject.description: Task management platform designed to simplify daily life. With an intuitive and efficient interface, you can create, read, update and delete tasks with ease.

thirdProject.title: EzRental
thirdProject.description: A property rental platform inspired by Airbnb, allowing users to search, book, and manage stays intuitively. It features search filters, user profiles, and a booking system for a seamless experience.

fourthProject.title: BettyStore
fourthProject.description: A Point of Sale (POS) system developed for a local store, enabling efficient sales management, inventory tracking, and customer management.

certificationOne.title: Programming with JavaScript
certificationOne.description: A comprehensive course covering the fundamentals of JavaScript, including ES6+ features, DOM manipulation, and asynchronous programming.

certificationTwo.title: Responsive Web Design
certificationTwo.description: This certification focuses on creating modern, responsive layouts using HTML, CSS, and Flexbox/Grid. It emphasizes building adaptable websites for various devices while ensuring optimal user experience.

certificationThree.title: Achievement Test Certificate
certificationThree.description: This certification recognizes high proficiency in English at the B1-B2 level. It focuses on key skills such as speaking, listening, reading, and writing. Practical assessments ensure effective communication in diverse contexts.

experienceOne.title: Software Developer
experienceOne.description: I worked on the project 'Academic Management of the Faculty of Science and Technology - UMSS', from the initial concept through UI design and database implementation, as well as leading my team.

experienceTwo.title: Frontend Developer
experienceTwo.description: I worked with No Country’s selected team, including developers, UX/UI designers, QA specialists, and a team lead from various countries, to develop a responsive web platform for a Argentina's secondary school.

experienceThree.title: Frontend Development
experienceThree.description: JavaScript • TypeScript • ReactJs • NextJs • Tailwind CSS • Ant Design • Bootstrap • Cloudinary Figma • Redux • Zustand

experienceFour.title: Backend Development
experienceFour.description: NodeJs • ExpressJs • PostgreSQL • SQLServer •  Spring Boot • Java • PHP • Git • Firebase • Cloudinary • RESTful APIs
